alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 28 at 7:47PM PDT until October 29 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Western Mojave Desert, Eastern Mojave Desert, Morongo Basin and Cadiz Basin. In Nevada, Northeast Clark County, Las Vegas Valley and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and outdoor holiday decor. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County
